direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods handle the installation of validators with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods interact with the validatorMap to retrieve or set validators based on country codes.
The setValidator method indirectly affects the isValid method by modifying the validators used for validation.
The setValidator method indirectly interacts with RegexValidator instances through the Validator class, which uses RegexValidator for regex validation.
Both methods handle the creation and management of validators with similar control flows and data structures.
